extract_ICESat.py¶

Extracts ICESat data to the extent of a DEM or Image (GeoImg)

usage: extract_ICESat.py [-h] [-d WORKDIR] [-o OUTFILE] DEM

Positional Arguments¶

DEM path to DEM from which the extent is used to extract ICESat data

Named Arguments¶

-d, --workdir Current working directory. [default=./]
-o, --outfile Output filename. [default=ICESat_DEM.h5]
